member.name: ID3D11RasterizerState.GetDesc
member.summary: Gets the description for rasterizer state that you used to create the rasterizer-state object.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives a description of the rasterizer state.

member.name: ID3D11RasterizerState
member.summary: The rasterizer-state interface holds a description for rasterizer state that you can bind to the rasterizer stage.
